meanings.definition: To reproduce (written material) by a duplicating machine that uses a stencil.
meanings.sent1: She cyclostyled the flyers for the event.
meanings.sent2: The office regularly cyclostyled important documents.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally cyclostyled her own handout upside down.
meanings.sent4: His words were cyclostyled into the minds of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cyclostyled machine echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A duplicating machine that uses a stencil to reproduce written material.
meanings.sent1: The old cyclostyled in the corner was still functional.
meanings.sent2: The school purchased a new cyclostyled for the administrative office.
meanings.sent3: The cyclostyled hummed quietly as it worked its magic.
meanings.sent4: The cyclostyled was a lifesaver during the printing rush.
meanings.sent5: The cyclostyled produced crisp copies of the report.
